auth.welcomeDescription: Connect your development identity to unlock the full experience.
auth.agreeTerms: By continuing, you agree to our Terms and Privacy Policy.

landing.heroSubtitle: Connect your developer identity, earn rewards for contributions, and collaborate in real-time. The first platform to unify code, community, and incentives.
landing.featuresSubtitle: A complete ecosystem designed to supercharge open source communities and reward meaningful contributions.

codeNexus.title: Code Nexus
codeNexus.description: Aggregate repositories from GitHub, GitLab, and more. Manage your entire contribution portfolio in one unified dashboard.

incentive.title: Incentive System
incentive.description: Gamify contributions with quests, leaderboards, and XP. Reward your community automatically with token distributions.

chat.title: Contextual Chat
chat.description: Discord-style communication rooms integrated directly with your repositories, issues, and pull requests.

orgHub.title: Organization Hub
orgHub.description: Dedicated profile pages for organizations to showcase projects, members, and available bounties.

discovery.title: Smart Discovery
discovery.description: AI-powered recommendations to help developers find the perfect organizations based on their skills and interests.

sync.title: Instant Sync
sync.description: Real-time synchronization of contributions and profile stats across all connected code platforms.

discover.title: Discover Organizations
discover.subtitle: Explore 5,000+ open source organizations. Find your next project, earn incentives, and make an impact.

incentive.title: Incentive Program
incentive.description: Complete tasks, earn points, redeem prizes
incentive.selectCampaign: Please select a campaign to view tasks
incentive.prizeStoreDescription: Redeem amazing prizes with your points
incentive.leaderboardDescription: View the most active contributors in the community

explore.title: Explore
explore.subtitle: Discover organizations, Matrix spaces, and communities with AI
explore.searchPlaceholder: Search for communities, organizations, or topics...
explore.searchingAcross: Searching across organizations, Matrix spaces, and web
explore.errorMessage: Sorry, something went wrong. Please try again.
explore.connectionError: Unable to complete search. Please check your connection.

realOrgs.title: Real Organizations
realOrgs.description: Search your connected GitHub organizations and their communities

matrixSpaces.title: Matrix Spaces
matrixSpaces.description: Discover public Matrix rooms and community spaces

aiPowered.title: AI-Powered
aiPowered.description: Get intelligent answers and recommendations powered by AI

common.confirmDelete: Are you sure you want to delete?
